text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
N-Nothing, it's fine! My friend 
just…… accidentally sent me 
this weird LANE message……!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
(……Wait, how could someone even send a 
chain letter accidentally!? Geez～……!!)

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
……! It's here! This is it! 
The "Cursed LANE" message!!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Dia…? Isn't that what everyone in class was 
talking about? The one where "You'll get 
cursed if you don't send this to 5 people"?

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
No way…… To think it even reached you……! 
……It's ok, Dia. I'm sure it's scary, b-but 
I… I'll protect——

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
I'm fine, Crowny. I'm the one who asked 
my classmates to send it to me♪

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: I won't give in to curses!
